problem.markdown:
>>How do you use information about the bottleneck? <<
( ) Place QC after the botleneck to only good parts flow through the remainder of the production line. (x) Use the bottleneck capacity to limit the rate of flow of material through the system. ( ) Place bottleneck at the end of the line so the production rate is the production rate of the bottleneck.
